Sunglasses as a Tie or Sash Accessory: For a fun and quirky outfit accessory, wear sunglasses as a necktie or a sash, attached to clothing. This adds a unique fashion statement to any outfit and can be a great conversation starter.
Sunglasses as a Book Marker: Use sunglasses as a creative and stylish book marker. Simply place the sunglasses on the pages of the book that you're reading.
Sunglasses as a Hair Accessory: Wrap a fabric or beaded band around the top of the sunglasses and slip it into your hair to hold it in place or add a touch of flair.
Sunglasses as a Plant Holder: Create a planter for small plants or succulents by repurposing sunglasses. Simply remove the lenses and fill the frame with soil and plants.
Sunglasses as a Bottle Opener: With some DIY skills, you can add a bottle opener to the arms of your sunglasses. This could be a fun and practical addition to your accessories.
